intro: Gardenia ngoyensis, commonly known as the Ngoyi gardenia, is a species of flowering plant native to the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and fragrant white flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments within tropical rainforests. Its flowers are often used in traditional medicine and are also appreciated for their ornamental value. Gardenia ngoyensis is relatively rare and faces threats from habitat loss and over-collection.
